annotation.spannedText: Unvaccinated children, however, require much more testing

classMention.mentionClass: Unvaccinated children, however, require much more testing

annotation.spannedText: This disparity in how children are evaluated in the ER is based on very basic differences in how high of a risk children are at for invasive bacterial infections

annotation.spannedText: the diseases we vaccinate against aren’t just nuisances; they kill and maim children every day, and they are almost completely preventable by vaccination

annotation.spannedText: these illnesses are starting to make a comeback because of the anti-vaccine movement
